title: League of legends last update
body:
Hello Summoners , i never witnessed lol update in the new client because i stopped playing since the old one , so now when i'm updating lol for the last patch i noticed that it says 80 MB but downloading more it is like 135/80 MB how even is that possible it means my downloads are 130 % not 100 so is it abnormal or i just wait this Eternal patch :v  
im igniting {{summoner:14}}

replies.body:
HAH! Those visual bugs are always rather funny to me. No worries, this can happen if you have a weird sort of hiccup in your connection while the patch is downloading. Sometimes the progress will keep going up, even though it's not actually downloading anymore, so when it kicks back in it can look like 1000mb/500mb downloaded xD. 

If it finishes up eventually, great! If not, try switching to an ethernet cord and possibly updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well.
